channel.title: Class Idea-Striker
channel.description:
Class-Striker
Neutral Killing
Passive-Recognition-All players that visit you will recognize you and if you attack them, you'll fail unless they're blocked or getting healed.
Passive-Knitting-Every three nights, you will create another mask. You are also night immune.
Day Ability-Masked Murderer-Change your mask removing all recognition of you. Starts at 1 Use.
Night Ability-Strike-Attack a player. Your attack goes through immunity except for the MM's and for Reaper, they'll absorb 2 SOULS.

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I would expect a class with the problem of being recognized as having an excellent other ability, such as infinite making player’s stop talking and knowing who recognized them, so as to silence them.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
“That does not have night immunity at all” yes let’s read for once

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
This one is blatantly underpowered.
The Reaper can make others clam up, can use souls to pierce Night Immunity.
The Possessor can make others to attack someone else, which shields them from Knight Protection(actually the Knight will kill the Possessed) and is immune to occupation.

And those two are underpowered, they rarely win unless converted into the King(which should not be an easy way out but is currently)
Your suggestion is a killer who basically kills someone they were not visited by only, that always pierces Night Immunity, that does not even have Night Immunity at all and…
that does not even have anything else than one killing ability and one ability to ease up its weakness!
Also, there is a good reason why MM has Night Immunity(its death is horrible for Unseen) and that one should not be able to be pierced with ease

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
either that or its a subconscious recognition, maybe

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
okay
maybe for lore, they dont recognize the person during the day because they only saw the person while they were wearing the mask?

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
They will only be informed when the Striker attacks them.

They won’t know who the Striker is.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Idea-Striker
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
cupcakeaj2:

Passive-Recognition-All players that visit you will recognize you and if you attack them, you’ll fail unless they’re blocked or getting healed.

will they be notified, thus telling them that theres a striker in the game, and who said striker is?

Read full topic
